us.zoom.sdk

Interface NetworkConnectionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    us.zoom.androidlib.util.IListener

    public interface NetworkConnectionListener
extends us.zoom.androidlib.util.IListener
    Callback event of completing the detection of proxy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onProxySettingNotification(ProxySettingHandler handler)
      The callback will be triggered if the proxy requests to input the username and password.
      void onSSLCertVerifyNotification(SSLCertVerificationHandler handler)
      The callback will be triggered when the SSL is verified.

    • Method Detail

      • onProxySettingNotification

        void onProxySettingNotification(ProxySettingHandler handler)
        The callback will be triggered if the proxy requests to input the username and password.
        Parameters:
        handler - Use the handler to configure the related information. For more details, see ProxySettingHandler.

      • onSSLCertVerifyNotification

        void onSSLCertVerifyNotification(SSLCertVerificationHandler handler)
        The callback will be triggered when the SSL is verified.
        Parameters:
        handler - Use the handler to check the related information. For more details, see SSLCertVerificationHandler
